remarks: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a monoid iff the other one is.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
mndprop.b $e |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) $.
mndprop.p $e |- ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) $.
mndprop $p |- ( K e. Mnd <-> L e. Mnd ) $.
